to increase and become four times as big or as high, or to make something increase in this way
Food prices quadrupled during the war.
The company has quadrupled its profits in just three years.
four times as big or as many
The subjects were given quadruple the normal dosage of the drug.
involving four things of the same kind
to increase or make something increase by four times
Pre-tax profits have more than quadrupled from £5 million to over £20 million.
OPEC quadrupled the price of oil.
We hope to quadruple production in two years.
